import'../DetailPage.css';import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function PokemonDetailsPage(){const[pokemonDetails,setPokemonDetails]=useState(null);const navigate=useNavigate();useEffect(()=>{// Fetch Pokemon details using the ID from the URL
const fetchPokemonDetails=async()=>{const pokemonId=window.location.pathname.split('/').pop();const response=await fetch("https://pokeapi.co/api/v2/pokemon/".concat(pokemonId));if(!response.ok){console.error('Failed to fetch Pokemon details');return;}const data=await response.json();setPokemonDetails(data);};fetchPokemonDetails();},[]);if(!pokemonDetails){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"pokemon-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:pokemonDetails.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"https://raw.githubusercontent.com/PokeAPI/sprites/master/sprites/pokemon/".concat(pokemonDetails.id,".png"),alt:pokemonDetails.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Type:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:pokemonDetails.types?pokemonDetails.types.map(type=>type.type.name).join(', '):'Unknown'}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"Abilities:"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:pokemonDetails.abilities.map((ability,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:ability.ability.name},index))})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"details-button",onClick:()=>navigate("/"),children:"Go Back"})]});}export default PokemonDetailsPage;
